puzzle
Class Puzzle

java.lang.Object
  puzzle.Puzzle

public class Puzzle
extends java.lang.Object

A Puzzle stores the list of words and the location of them in a PuzzleCell matrix

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sad Panda Software
